summary: u know whats making me hurt with happiness rn, is that i (in the past) used to think that obvs dan loved his family and being...
body: u know whats making me hurt with happiness rn, is that i (in the past) used to think that obvs dan loved his family and being with them but he just preferred to not be there for long periods of time but now hes showing us how happy he is, from the day he’s been there. from the breakfast adrian made him to the morning walks he had with his parents, to his christmas gift. and now with colin and walking him outdoors. i just feel like hes happy and ive never felt more happier for him than now

blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

summary: hi. i've been away from tumblr (and basically all the fandoms that i was a part of) since i started college, 3 years ago. i was...
question: hi. i've been away from tumblr (and basically all the fandoms that i was a part of) since i started college, 3 years ago. i was wondering if you could summarize the big dramas that happened? i heard about adress leaks and floor plans but have no idea what any of it is. id be very much appreciated ^^
answer:
I’ve only been running this shit show of a drama blog for less than a year, and before that I didn’t keep up too much, so I’m only going to be partially helpful here. Plus, I’m just going by memory, so I may miss some things. Also these aren’t necessarily in chronological order.


  • Dan make a joke in his trying to live my truth video about “things coming in and out of his mouth” and the Phandom freaked out thinking he just came out. He had to explain himself in a live show, and then the Phandom got mad at him for “taking it back” or whatever.
  • Some crazy bitch made a video saying she was going to go to ii and kill Phil so she could marry Dan or something and there was mass pandemonium. Everything turned out fine.
  • Dan and Phil moved, and phannies have been trying to figure out the floor plan of their apartment ever since.
  • Also, never ending bed discourse. Shortly after they moved, Dan did a live show from his bedroom and some people saw Phil’s shoes on the floor and it started this whole room sharing theory.
  • Dan posted an insta story with the caption “tylybb” and everyone freaked out thinking that “bb” obviously meant “baby” and he was talking about Phil.
  • Along the same lines, Dan called Phil “bub” and everyone suddenly decided that “bub” means “love of my life”
  • Dan and Phil stayed with Martyn and Cornelia in an Airbnb and a bunch of dickheads found the place online so they could prove it only had two bedrooms, then they spread the ad around, with the address of the place, while Dan and Phil were still there. (This also happened with various hotel rooms)
  • Phil liked a tweet that was mildly anti-phan and then unliked it after everyone cried because he “cancelled phan”
  • Dan’s brother started posting publicly online again and we all had an argument over whether we were allowed to watch his content.
  • Phil’s aunt made Dan a hat, everyone thinks that means they’re together.
  • Pinof is officially over, the gaming channel is on hiatus, and everyone thinks Dan and Phil are taking a break so they can get married.
  • Several times, one of them misspoke in a video and it caused mass panic. “It’s not the baby we want/it’s not your baby anymore” “baby/maybe” etc.


I can’t think of anything else off my head right now, but if anyone has anything to add, feel free!

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

summary: "I’m not sure if their silence is because it doesn’t bother them, or if they don’t want to piss anyone off by saying something,...
question: "I’m not sure if their silence is because it doesn’t bother them, or if they don’t want to piss anyone off by saying something, or if maybe they just plain don’t see the extent of it." that's the thing that truly annoys me. people can just say "oh, they don't care! i'll post whatever i want, it's harmless, don't call me out!" and that's why the phandom is such a mess. i can never tell whether dan and phil support, disapprove or don't care about all the weird shit a lot of their fans do
answer: This is the exact reason that I want 2019 to be the year of better communication.

reblog.comment: This is the exact reason that I want 2019 to be the year of better communication.

trail.content_raw: This is the exact reason that I want 2019 to be the year of better communication.
